GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.29 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
usb: host: Fix refcount leak in ehci_hcd_ppc_of_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit c0a4b454486b23bb4d94ce49f490830ecc354040, it was introduced in version v2.6.29 by commit 796bcae7361c28cf825780f6f1aac9dd3411394e. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: usb: host: Fix refcount leak in ehci_hcd_ppc_of_probe
